meanings.definition: A person who performs better or achieves more success than expected.
meanings.sent1: The overachiever in our class always finishes their work early.
meanings.sent2: She is known as the overachiever in the office because she always exceeds expectations.
meanings.sent3: The overachiever decided to finish all their homework before dinner.
meanings.sent4: Being an overachiever in the kitchen, she managed to bake three cakes in one afternoon.
meanings.sent5: The young overachiever impressed everyone with their exceptional grades.

meanings.definition: To perform better or achieve more success than expected.
meanings.sent1: He tends to overachieve in every project he takes on.
meanings.sent2: I always strive to overachieve in my goals to stand out.
meanings.sent3: She managed to overachieve in her running race by finishing first.
meanings.sent4: The team overachieved in the competition by winning against all odds.
meanings.sent5: The student overachieved in their exam, surprising everyone with their high score.
